resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75454</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75454</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b031e0d1-a8f8-49c6-9804-5a398172df0f#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A növények országa</string>
            <string language="en">Land of plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land der Betriebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Terre des usines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra das plantas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra delle piante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έδαφος των εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pista de plantas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A növények országának rövid jellemzése, a növények törzsei (zöldmoszatok, vörösmoszatok, barnamoszatok, mohák, zuzmók, harasztok, nyitvatermők, zárvatermők)</string>
            <string language="en">Short characterization of land of plants, branches of plants (green algae, red algae, brown algae, mosses, lichens, brakes, gymnosperms, angiospermae)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">rendszerezés,  rendszertan,  növények,  </string>
            <string language="en">ordination, taxonomy, plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Kennzeichnung des Landes der Betriebe, 
Zweige der Betriebe (grüne Algen, rote Algen, braune Algen, Moose, 
Flechten, Bremsen, Gymnospermen, Angiospermen)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractérisation courte de la terre des usines, 
branchements des usines (algues vertes, algues rouges, algues brunes, 
mousses, lichens, freins, gymnospermes, angiospermes)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caracterização curta da terra das plantas, 
filiais das plantas (algas verdes, algas vermelhas, algas marrons, 
musgos, lichens, freios, gymnosperms, angiospermas)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione corta di terra delle piante, rami 
delle piante (alghe verdi, alghe rosse, alghe brune, muschi, licheni, 
freni, gimnosperme, angiosperme)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομος χαρακτηρισμός του εδάφους των εγκαταστάσεων, 
κλάδοι των εγκαταστάσεων (πράσινα άλγη, κόκκινα άλγη, καφετιά 
άλγη, βρύα, λειχήνες, φρένα, gymnosperms, angiospermae)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caracterización corta de la pista de las 
plantas, ramificaciones de las plantas (algas verdes, algas rojas, 
algas marrones, musgos, liquenes, frenos, gimnospermas, angiospermas)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassifikation, Taxonomie, Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">classification, taxonomie, usines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ordination, taxonomy, plantas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ordination, tassonomia, piante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χειροτονία, ταξονομία, εγκαταστάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ordenación, taxonomía, plantas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">12-17</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75454</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=b031e0d1-a8f8-49c6-9804-5a398172df0f&v=1&b=5</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
